summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing sticker pack from the order  
Identified Problem: The order was marked as delivered, but the customer did not receive the sticker pack due to a possible address error.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer’s house number was incorrectly recorded as 12 instead of 17.  
- The customer suggested an alternative delivery location (Ipoh Fatt Enterprise) which could not be amended in the system.  
Resolution Offered: A refund to the customer's ZUS Balance was provided as the sticker pack could not be resent to the correct address.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially reported that the Matcha Macam sticker pack was missing from their order, which was marked as delivered. Upon investigation, it was revealed that the address was incorrectly recorded. The customer requested a resend to a different location, but this was not possible, leading to a refund being issued to their ZUS Balance. The root cause of the issue appears to be a miscommunication regarding the delivery address.

Identified Problem: Miscommunication or error in order preparation leading to the customer receiving a drink that did not match their order.

The interaction concluded with the customer expressing satisfaction with the resolution, despite initial frustration.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Did not receive the entire order  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication or mishandling by the delivery rider  
Contributing Factors:  
- The rider claimed to have delivered the order, but the security guard stated it was taken back.  
- The customer was unable to contact the rider for clarification.  
- The rider did not return the order to the outlet as per the company's records.  
Resolution Offered: The agent offered to resend the order with a new order ID and the customer requested a different rider.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially reported that they did not receive their entire order. After investigation, it was revealed that the rider claimed to have delivered it, but the security guard indicated it was taken back. The customer faced difficulties contacting the rider and expressed frustration over the situation, requesting a refund. The agent escalated the issue and offered to resend the order with a new rider, which the customer accepted. The root cause of the issue appears to be a miscommunication or mishandling by the delivery rider.

The agent acknowledged the issue, attributing it to a preparation error where foam had dissipated, resulting in less liquid. A full refund was offered and processed to the customer's ZUS balance. The interaction highlighted a quality control issue and a need for better communication regarding drink volume expectations.

Customer sentiment: Disappointed  
Primary Concern: The customer did not receive their Iced Americano order despite it being marked as delivered.  
Identified Problem: The order was likely delivered to the wrong address or person, and the rider did not communicate with the customer.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication or error by the delivery rider regarding the delivery address.  
- Lack of proper communication from the rider to the customer, as the customer was declined when attempting to contact the rider.  
Resolution Offered: A refund was processed to the customer's ZUS Balance.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed disappointment over not receiving their Iced Americano order, which was marked as delivered. The issue stemmed from the rider potentially delivering the order to the wrong address and failing to communicate with the customer. The agent offered a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance and acknowledged the unpleasant experience, promising to escalate the issue to prevent future occurrences.

text:
Hi There,

I would like to lodge an official complaint towards ZUS Coffee branch The
Flo Damansara. I had made an order at 14.57pm, 3rd July 2024. Order ID
24070324772. Basically I did not receive the order and drinks and claim as
the order is sent. RM38.90, in total 4 drinks is not a big amount but yet
doing business, for me as a consumer, is cheating. The driver called me
coincidently I was in a meeting which had passed the call. I got my staff
to call back right away, however the answer he got from the driver was
"call no pick up" and "don't know where it's located", so the order was
sent back to the store.

I am clearly written about the special remark on my shop name and which
floor. My other concern is, if it is sent back to the store, why did I not
receive any call or notification from the store to notify me and arrange
for pick up? Is this how Zus Coffee trains all the staff and causes this
type of trouble?

Basically I am from the service line as well. I feel it is not right if
this is how Zus coffee handles this type of case or order. yet I have
given a few attempts for a call but it is "user busy" at all the time.  It
is totally without responsibility for customer care.

I hope I can get an explanation from you all regarding this case by 1pm
tomorrow and kindly make a refund for this order.  Else I will officially
lodge a complaint to KPDN and contact my current officer to visit the store
in Zus Coffee @ The Flo Damansara.

Attach with the proof of order for reference.

Thank you.





-- 
Best Regards,
Karmen Khoo


Hi Karmen Khoo,     Greetings from ZUS Coffee!     We have refunded the order to ZUS Balance, kindly check on your end.  ​ Best Regards,  Khuzairi Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com
Hi Khuzairi,

Thanks for your reply on this matter. Initially, Zus please do get more
proper training to all the staff and keep up to the standards. All I would
say.

You may proceed with the immediate refund by today. Thanks


Hi Karmen Khoo,     Greetings from ZUS Coffee!     We understand how unpleasant this experience must have been for you and we would like to apologize for this. This shouldn’t have happened to you or any of our customers.      We really regret not being able to meet your expectations this time. We are putting the highest priority on this issue and will forward it to the relevant team to check and take necessary action to prevent this from happening again.       We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your unpleasant experience. Your feedback will help us improve our business and help us grow.      ​In this case, May we proceed to refund your ZUS balance as it will be immediate ​?  Best Regards,  Khuzairi Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com
summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Non-delivery of order and lack of communication from the store  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication between the delivery driver and the customer, leading to the order being returned to the store without proper notification  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of proper training for staff regarding delivery protocols and customer communication  
- Absence of follow-up communication from the store after the order was returned  
Resolution Offered: Refund issued to ZUS Balance  
Overall Summary: The customer, Karmen Khoo, expressed frustration over a non-delivery of her order from ZUS Coffee, citing miscommunication with the delivery driver and a lack of notification from the store. Despite the small monetary value of the order, Karmen felt cheated due to the service failure. The agent acknowledged the issue, apologized, and offered a refund to her ZUS Balance. The root cause of the issue appears to be inadequate staff training and poor communication protocols, which the company is addressing to prevent future occurrences.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing chocolate drizzle in the order and incorrect item received  
Identified Problem: The customer received an incorrect drink without the requested chocolate drizzle and was not informed about the absence of whipped cream for delivery orders.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of clarity in the order preparation process leading to missing items.  
- Miscommunication regarding the availability of whipped cream for delivery orders, which was not clearly conveyed to the customer prior to the order.  
Resolution Offered: The agent offered to resend the correct drink with the chocolate drizzle to the same address and confirmed that the customer could keep the incorrect drink without needing to return it.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially raised a concern about receiving the wrong item in their order, specifically missing the chocolate drizzle and not receiving whipped cream. The agent acknowledged the issue and clarified that whipped cream is not served for delivery due to hygiene reasons. The agent then arranged for a new order to be sent with the correct item, addressing the customer's concerns. The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of order preparation errors and a lack of clear communication regarding product availability.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Order not received  
Identified Problem: Order was routed to the wrong location due to a sudden address change  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer did not receive their order because it was sent to an incorrect address (Wisma) instead of their intended location (NU).  
- The system's inability to amend the order after it was prepared and the lack of options for the customer to retrieve the order.  

Resolution Offered: A 50% discount voucher for the next purchase was provided to the customer.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving their order, which was mistakenly routed to a different location due to a sudden address change. The agent explained that once the order was prepared, it could not be amended, and they could not arrange for a rider to pick up the order. As a resolution, the agent offered a 50% discount voucher for the customer's next purchase. The root cause of the issue was the misrouting of the order due to the address change and the limitations of the system in handling such situations.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Invalid phone number registration and refund request for an incorrect order  
Identified Problem: The customer's phone number was not recognized in the system, preventing account verification and initial communication.  
Contributing Factors:  
- System error or miscommunication regarding phone number registration  
- App lag leading to an incorrect order quantity being selected  
Resolution Offered: Refund processed through ZUS Balance after confirming the customer's preference.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially faced issues with their phone number not being recognized in the system, which delayed the refund process for an incorrectly ordered item due to app lag. After confirming their identity and preferences, the agent successfully processed the refund to the customer's ZUS Balance. The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of system errors related to phone number registration and technical issues with the app.

text:
Hi there,

My name is Wina and i am currently at Elite Membership level. I would like to inquire about my monthly vouchers that seems to be missing for this month (August 2024).

I would appreciate it very much if could revert to me back on this matter a.s.a.p.

Thanks :-)


Wina K



Sent from my iPhone
Hi Wina K,     Greetings from ZUS Coffee.     Thank you for replying. Glad to hear that the voucher is now visible in your account. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by a system issue a few days ago.     Should you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to let us know. Thank you and have a nice day! ?  Best Regards,       Bawani Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com
Hi Bawani, Thanks for responding to my query. Just to update you, the vouchers are now available. Perhaps a glitch in the app? But they’re there now. Sorry for the inconvenience ya. Wina Sent from my iPhone

Thank you for reaching  out to us. ​Could you please provide us with your registered email address so that we may verify your details and offer you additional assistance? summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Customer is unable to top up their account despite multiple attempts.  
Identified Problem: The bank declined the transaction, which was not captured by the payment gateway.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer attempted to top up multiple times without success.  
- Miscommunication regarding the correct account details for the top-up.  
Resolution Offered: The agent informed the customer that the transaction was rejected by the bank and advised them to check with their bank for the reversal of the charge.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over being unable to top up their account multiple times, with the bank indicating that the transactions were rejected by ZUS Coffee's payment gateway. The agent clarified the situation and advised the customer to follow up with their bank regarding the reversal of the charges. The root cause of the issue appears to be a failure in the payment processing system, leading to declined transactions.

The customer expressed frustration but rated the service positively at the end of the interaction.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Inability to use the "Buy 1 Free 1" voucher after registering for the service.  
Identified Problem: The voucher is not applicable for new users who registered with a referral code and have not made a purchase yet.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding voucher eligibility for new users.  
- Technical issues preventing the voucher from being used.  
Resolution Offered: The agent informed the customer that the technical team is working on the issue and advised the customer to try using the voucher again within 48 hours.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over being unable to use a "Buy 1 Free 1" voucher after registering with ZUS Coffee. The main issue stemmed from a misunderstanding of the voucher's eligibility criteria for new users, compounded by technical difficulties. The agent acknowledged the inconvenience and assured the customer that the technical team was addressing the issue, suggesting they try again in 48 hours.

- Lack of clarity in the ordering process that may have led to the mistake.

After clarifying the issue, the agent confirmed the order was ready for pickup and facilitated a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance. The root cause of the issue appears to be a miscommunication regarding the outlet selection during the ordering process. The customer ended the chat on a positive note, expressing gratitude for the assistance provided.

Dear Sir/Madam,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to request a
withdrawal/refund of my ZUS balance. Please find my details below for your
reference:

   - Name: NUR SOFEA AIRINA BINTI RAMLI
   - Account Number: 13044024759646 BANK ISLAM
   - ZUS Balance Amount: RM50

I would appreciate it if you could process this request at your earliest
convenience. Should you require any additional information or
documentation, please let me know.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,

NUR SOFEA AIRINA BINTI RAMLI
014-3885804/nanalily551@gmail.com


Hi nananiim,  Hi, Greetings from ZUS Coffee!     I understand your request regarding the ZUS withdrawal. Please be informed that we are unable to proceed with the withdrawal because the amount in question is a promotional balance. Promotional balances cannot be withdrawn and can only be used for ZUS rewards.    I hope this email finds you well.     Feel free to contact us for further assistance.  Thank you and have a great day ahead!  Warmest Regards,    Gventhri Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com
summary:
Customer sentiment: Disappointed  
Primary Concern: Request for withdrawal/refund of ZUS balance  
Identified Problem: The balance in question is a promotional balance that cannot be withdrawn.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer was likely unaware that promotional balances are non-withdrawable.  
- Lack of clear communication regarding the terms of promotional balances at the time of issuance.  
Resolution Offered: The agent informed the customer that the promotional balance can only be used for ZUS rewards and cannot be withdrawn.  
Overall Summary: The customer, Nur Sofea Airina Binti Ramli, requested a withdrawal of her ZUS balance of RM50. The agent responded that the balance was a promotional one, which cannot be withdrawn and is only applicable for rewards. The primary issue stems from the customer's misunderstanding of the promotional balance terms, indicating a need for clearer communication regarding such promotions.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Incorrect drink order and insufficient refund amount  
Identified Problem: The coffee shop prepared the wrong drink (matcha latte instead of CEO coconut latte) and the drink was served at a lower volume than expected.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication or error in order preparation at the coffee shop  
- System limitations affecting refund processing and pricing discrepancies  
Resolution Offered: Refund of the incorrect drink amount and a 20% discount voucher for future use.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over receiving the wrong drink and the insufficient refund amount. The main issue stemmed from an error in the order preparation and system limitations that affected the refund process. The agent offered a refund and a discount voucher as compensation, which the customer accepted.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Payment error for a top-up transaction  
Identified Problem: The customer's online banking payment was deducted but not credited, showing a pending status.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer made two top-up transactions, but only one was credited.  
- The system did not capture the second transaction, leading to confusion and frustration.  
Resolution Offered: The agent suggested the customer contact their bank for further assistance regarding the payment that did not go through.  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced a payment error where a top-up via online banking was deducted from their account but not credited, showing a pending status. Despite the agent confirming the successful payment for another transaction, the customer was left frustrated due to the lack of resolution for the pending payment. The root cause appears to be a system error or miscommunication regarding the transaction status, prompting the customer to seek further assistance from their bank.

text:
hi i need to complaint the service and order.

today 2/8/2023 i order CEO coconut latte through ZUS APPS at Ampang
Spectrum branch.

Firstly, the order not go in the system and i just wait in car, i felt took
too long time and why no any update and walk in the shop and check with the
staff. Then they start to make my coffee.

Secondly, there was no sticker on the cup. I ordered CEO COCONUT LATTE with
double BOSS SHOT(use the voucher). But when I took the first sip, I was
very surprised. Because it was too sweet. This was not the CEO I usually
drink. The barista put condensed milk, so it was not what I ordered. I was
very frustrated and spoil my whole morning……

Please find the attachment that i attached below thanks.


Hi Woo Bowie,   Greetings from ZUS Coffee,  As we previously discussed over the phone, we regret to inform you that we will not be able to fulfill the recovery order for tomorrow. Due to our standard processing timeframe of 24 hours, we're issuing a refund for the order directly to your ZUS Balance. You should see the refund reflected on your account already. We understand this may have caused inconvenience and disappointment, and we apologize for any distress or frustration this has caused. We appreciate your patience and look forward to assisting you again when you're ready to reorder. Should you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to let us know.  Thank you and have a nice day ahead!          -- Best Regards,   Pavitra Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com
thanks for your replied. yup. i can pick up a new CEO COCONUT LATTE. May i
know how to claim back? thank you


Hi Woo Bowie,  Greetings from ZUS Coffee,  Thank you for bringing this to our attention and for providing the pictures. We regret to inform you that a technical issue with our server caused an inconvenience with your order, and we're deeply sorry that our barista also made an error in preparing it. We're giving this matter our immediate attention and will escalate it to our technical team to investigate and take corrective action to prevent similar incidents in the future. In addition to addressing the issue with your order, we have also notified the outlet's Point of Contact (PIC) to investigate the matter further and take necessary corrective action from their side.   In this case, may I confirm will you be able to pick up a new Iced CEO Coconut Latté 1x from the outlet once again?  Looking forward to your response. Once again please accept our sincere apologies for this unpleasant experience you have encountered with us. Should you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to let us know.  Thank you and have a nice day ahead!        -- Best Regards,   Pavitra Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com

The company acknowledged the issues, issued a refund, and offered to replace the drink, while also committing to investigate the technical and service errors to prevent future occurrences.

The customer highlighted slow service at the outlet and dissatisfaction with the handling of the order. The agent indicated that the delay was due to the delivery rider not collecting the order promptly, but the customer felt that the outlet's service was consistently poor. The interaction ended with the agent promising to forward the feedback for further investigation, but the customer remained dissatisfied with the outlet's performance.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Double payment charges for a single order  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication and misunderstanding regarding the payment process  
Contributing Factors:  
- Customer believed the first payment was unsuccessful, leading to a second payment  
- Agent's responses were repetitive and did not address the customer's specific issue effectively  
Resolution Offered: Refund for the double payment, pending customer bank details  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced frustration due to being charged twice for a single order, stemming from a misunderstanding about the payment process. The agent struggled to comprehend the customer's issue, leading to ineffective communication. A refund was offered, but the customer was hesitant to provide personal bank details due to concerns about security, resulting in dissatisfaction with the service.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Customer ordered a 1L bottle of Cafe Latté that was out of stock but still showed as an active order in the app.  
Identified Problem: Lack of real-time inventory updates leading to the customer being able to place an order for an out-of-stock item.  
Contributing Factors:  
- System error or miscommunication regarding inventory status.  
- Delay in communication from the outlet about the stock availability.  
Resolution Offered: The order was canceled and refunded to the customer's ZUS Balance.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over ordering a 1L bottle of Cafe Latté that was out of stock, despite it being an active order in the app. The root cause was identified as a lack of real-time inventory updates, which led to the order being placed for an unavailable item. The agent successfully canceled the order and issued a refund, resolving the immediate issue.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Positive  
Primary Concern: Received the wrong drink order  
Identified Problem: Incorrect item (iced drink instead of hot Spanish latte) sent to the customer  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication during order preparation  
- Potential system error in order processing  
Resolution Offered: Replacement order for the correct drink with no additional charges  
Overall Summary: The customer initially raised a concern about receiving the wrong drink (iced instead of extra hot Spanish latte) and expressed that they could not consume the incorrect item due to a migraine. The agent acknowledged the mistake, apologized, and arranged for a replacement order at no extra cost. The customer was satisfied with the resolution and expressed appreciation for the customer service provided. The root cause of the issue appears to be a miscommunication or error in the order preparation process.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Payment error leading to an order not being processed  
Identified Problem: A failure in the payment processing system when the customer attempted to pay directly through online banking  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer’s bank deducted the payment, but the order did not reflect as paid in the app.  
- The customer had to use a different payment method (top-up) to complete a subsequent order, leading to confusion and frustration over being charged twice.  
Resolution Offered: The agent informed the customer that the floating amount would be refunded within 14 working days if charged, and suggested reopening the chat for further assistance if needed.  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced a payment error when attempting to pay for an order through online banking, resulting in the order not being processed despite the bank deducting the payment. This led to the customer having to use a different payment method to complete a subsequent order, causing frustration over potentially being charged twice. The agent offered a resolution regarding the refund process but did not resolve the immediate concern about the first order.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Double payment deduction from the customer's bank account  
Identified Problem: System error leading to confusion over payment status  
Contributing Factors:  
- The app indicated that the payment was still pending, prompting a second payment.  
- The customer received conflicting information from the cashier regarding the order status.  
Resolution Offered: The agent requested bank details to process a refund, but the customer was advised to contact their bank for further assistance.  
Overall Summary: The customer reported a double deduction of RM9.25 from their bank account related to an order placed through the ZUS App. The customer believed the issue stemmed from a system error that showed the payment as pending, leading them to make a second payment. The agent confirmed no double payment was recorded on their end and suggested the customer contact their bank for further assistance. The interaction highlighted a potential issue with the app's payment processing system, causing confusion and frustration for the customer.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Payment not processed despite being deducted from the bank account  
Identified Problem: Payment failure due to a pre-authorization hold by the bank  
Contributing Factors:  
- Customer selected the wrong payment option initially  
- Customer attempted to top up again using online banking, leading to confusion about the payment status  
Resolution Offered: Customer was informed that the deducted amount is a pre-authorization hold and will be reflected back in their account within 7 working days; advised to retry payment using a different method.  
Overall Summary: The customer faced an issue with their payment not being processed through the app, despite the amount being deducted from their bank account. The root cause was identified as a pre-authorization hold by the bank, which was not clearly communicated initially. The customer expressed frustration over the situation, but the agent provided information on the expected resolution timeline and suggested retrying the payment.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Double payment charges due to a failed transaction  
Identified Problem: Technical issues with the ZUS Coffee app leading to double payment charges  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding order ID and payment details  
- Technical issues with the app affecting transaction processing  
Resolution Offered: Refund of the double payment within 7-14 working days  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over being charged twice for a transaction that failed in the ZUS Coffee app. The agent acknowledged the issue as a technical error and assured the customer that a refund would be processed within 7-14 working days. The interaction highlighted miscommunication regarding the order ID and the app's technical failures as the root causes of the customer's issue.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Received the wrong item (Vietnamese Spanish Latte) and it did not meet expectations.  
Identified Problem: The drink was prepared incorrectly or did not match the customer's previous experiences with the product.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the drink's appearance and taste.  
- The last batch of the Vietnamese Spanish Latte was thicker than usual, leading to dissatisfaction.  
Resolution Offered: A 20% discount voucher and a one-time refund were offered as apologies.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over receiving the wrong item and dissatisfaction with the quality of the Vietnamese Spanish Latte, which appeared different and tasted weird compared to previous orders. The agent confirmed that the drink was made correctly but acknowledged that the last batch was thicker than usual. Although the agent offered a discount and a refund, the customer ultimately declined these offers, indicating a preference for a replacement drink. The interaction highlighted issues with product consistency and communication about changes in product quality.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Received incorrect milk in the order (dairy instead of oat milk)  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication or error in order preparation  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer has a history of ordering oat milk, indicating a possible mix-up in the order process.  
- The agent confirmed that the drink was made according to standard operating procedures (SOP), suggesting a potential issue with the outlet's adherence to customer preferences.  
Resolution Offered: The agent offered to resend the order and provided a new order ID for the customer to pick up the correct drink.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially raised a concern about receiving dairy milk instead of oat milk in their hot Australian chocolate order. Despite the agent's confirmation that the drink was made according to SOP, the customer insisted that the drink was incorrect based on their past preferences. The interaction included delays and frustrations from the customer regarding the service, but ultimately, the agent offered to resend the order, which the customer accepted. The root cause appears to be a miscommunication or error in the order preparation process at the outlet.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Incorrect order placed at the wrong outlet  
Identified Problem: Customer selected the wrong outlet for their order, leading to a cancellation request.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the order process and outlet selection.  
- Customer's confusion about the refund process and timeline for receiving funds back to their bank account.  
Resolution Offered: Order was cancelled, and a refund was processed to the customer's ZUS Balance. The customer was informed that the refund to their bank account would take up to 14 business days.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially faced an issue with placing an order at the wrong outlet, which led to a cancellation request. The agent successfully processed the cancellation and initiated a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance. However, the customer expressed frustration regarding the timeline for receiving the funds back to their bank account, indicating a lack of clarity about the refund process. The root cause of the issue stemmed from the customer's misunderstanding of the order and refund procedures.

Identified Problem: Lack of communication regarding stock availability and delays in restocking  
Contributing Factors:  
- Automated responses may have caused confusion about message receipt

Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over the lack of communication regarding the restocking of cake options at the Boulevard Commercial Centre Miri franchise, particularly in relation to a birthday voucher that was about to expire. The agent confirmed that the cakes were still out of stock but assured the customer that they would be available the next day. The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of automated responses leading to confusion and delays in product availability. The interaction ended positively, with the customer expressing satisfaction upon receiving the information.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Lack of WiFi service at ZUS Coffee outlets despite signage indicating availability.  
Identified Problem: Inconsistent communication regarding WiFi availability at different outlets.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Misleading signage at the outlet suggesting WiFi is available for customers when it is not.  
- Lack of centralized information for customer service agents regarding which outlets offer WiFi.  
Resolution Offered: The agent promised to forward the customer's complaint to the relevant team for review.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over the inconsistency of WiFi availability at ZUS Coffee outlets, specifically mentioning the Bandar Mahkota Cheras location where signage indicated WiFi was available for customers, but staff denied access. The agent acknowledged the issue and stated that they would escalate the complaint, highlighting a lack of clear communication and information regarding WiFi services at various locations as the root cause of the customer's dissatisfaction.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay in delivery despite order status showing as delivered  
Identified Problem: The delivery rider was unreachable, causing a significant delay in receiving the order  
Contributing Factors:  
- The rider's inability to be contacted, leading to uncertainty about the order's status  
- Potential miscommunication or operational issues at the outlet regarding delivery logistics  
Resolution Offered: The agent offered to resend the drinks or process a refund, and assured the customer that the issue would be escalated for future improvements  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a delayed delivery, despite the order status indicating it had been delivered. The root cause identified was the delivery rider being unreachable, which resulted in a wait of over an hour for the customer to receive their order. The agent acknowledged the issue, offered a resolution, and committed to forwarding the feedback to improve future service.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing item from the order and incorrect delivery address  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the delivery address and lack of contact from the delivery rider  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer provided an incorrect address in the order (23, Jalan Kluang Perdana 1 instead of No 12, Jalan Kluang Perdana 23).  
- The delivery rider did not call the customer upon arrival, leading to confusion and frustration.  
Resolution Offered: The agent offered to cancel the order and issue a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance, allowing them to place a new order with the correct address.  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced frustration due to receiving a delivery at the wrong address and the rider's failure to contact them. The root cause of the issue stemmed from a miscommunication regarding the delivery address, compounded by the rider not calling the customer. The agent resolved the situation by offering a refund and allowing the customer to reorder with the correct address.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Invalid phone number registration and order cancellation  
Identified Problem: The customer's phone number is not recognized in the system, preventing them from accessing their account.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer provided a phone number that does not match the registered format or is not registered at all.  
- The customer mistakenly selected the wrong store for order pickup, leading to a request for cancellation or delivery.  
Resolution Offered: A 50% discount voucher was provided as compensation for the inconvenience.  
Overall Summary: The customer, Steven, faced issues with an unrecognized phone number while trying to access their account and subsequently requested a refund for an order placed at the wrong store. The agent informed him that cancellations were not possible once the order was prepared. As a resolution, the agent offered a 50% discount voucher as a token of apology. The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of the customer's phone number not being registered and the selection of the wrong store for pickup.

The root cause of the issue was the power outage at the coffee outlet, which hindered order fulfillment.

Overall Summary: The customer expressed dissatisfaction with their coffee order, stating it was not filled to the expected level. Ultimately, the agent offered to resend the order, which the customer accepted, but the interaction highlighted issues with clarity and responsiveness in the service process.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Customer wants to cancel an order due to an incorrect order/outlet issue.  
Identified Problem: The order was not prepared because no rider was assigned, leading to confusion and frustration for the customer.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The system's inability to assign a rider in a timely manner.  
- Repeated requests for the order ID without resolution, causing miscommunication.  
Resolution Offered: The agent stated that if a rider could not be found within 30 minutes, a refund would be processed automatically. However, once a rider was assigned, the order could not be canceled.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over an incorrect order and sought to cancel it. The main issue stemmed from the system's failure to assign a rider promptly, leading to confusion during the chat. Despite the agent's attempts to assist, the repeated requests for the order ID and the eventual assignment of a rider prevented the cancellation, leaving the customer dissatisfied.

Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the order status and stock availability.  
- Repeated issues with entering the correct order ID, leading to delays in resolution.  
Resolution Offered: The agent canceled the entire order and issued a full refund to the customer's ZUS Balance.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially expressed frustration over not receiving their full order and requested a refund. After several attempts to clarify the order ID and the issue, it was revealed that one item was out of stock. The agent apologized for the inconvenience and processed a full refund to the customer's ZUS Balance. The interaction highlighted issues with order fulfillment and communication, leading to the customer's dissatisfaction.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Neutral  
Primary Concern: Missing velvet cream in iced dark oolong cham latte  
Identified Problem: Velvet cream was included but dissolved into the drink, leading to the perception that it was missing.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the visibility of the velvet cream in the drink.  
- Potential preparation or serving issue at the outlet that caused the cream to dissolve.  
Resolution Offered: Clarification that the velvet cream was included but dissolved, and an apology for the oversight.  
Overall Summary: The customer raised a concern about not receiving the velvet cream in their iced dark oolong cham latte. After some back and forth, it was clarified that the cream was included but had dissolved into the drink, which led to the misunderstanding. The agent apologized for the oversight and provided clarification, resolving the customer's query. The root cause appears to be a combination of miscommunication and a possible preparation issue at the outlet.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Unable to add orders under the combo option in the app  
Identified Problem: Technical issue with the app causing it to loop until timeout when trying to add a combo order  
Contributing Factors:  
- The app has been malfunctioning for several days, indicating a potential ongoing issue.  
- Basic troubleshooting steps suggested (uninstalling and reinstalling the app) were not effective and were met with skepticism by the customer.  
Resolution Offered: The issue has been escalated to the tech team, with an estimated resolution time of 3-7 working days.  
Overall Summary: The customer reported an ongoing issue with the app where they were unable to add combo orders, experiencing a looping timeout. Despite following basic troubleshooting steps suggested by the agent, the problem persisted. The agent escalated the issue to the tech team for further investigation, with a resolution timeframe provided. The root cause appears to be a technical malfunction within the app affecting the combo ordering feature.

What packaging is not considered delivery-friendly?
Items that are prone to damage/spillage during delivery as they were not packed securely.  

- Damaged packaging [For NON-LIQUID] - Eg: The food packaging has cracks, rips, leaks or deformations, etc. These damages were NOT caused by liquid spillage 
- Spillage [For LIQUID ITEM ONLY] - Eg: Liquid items flowed out of its cup.

Kindly note that refunds are done based on a case-by-case basis.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Disappointed  
Primary Concern: Received a coffee without a lid, causing spillage and hygiene issues.  
Identified Problem: Inadequate packaging leading to spillage during delivery.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Poor packaging practices for liquid items.  
- Lack of labeling on the coffee cup, leading to confusion.  
Resolution Offered: Refund to ZUS Balance and option to resend the coffee.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed disappointment over receiving a coffee without a lid, resulting in spillage and hygiene concerns. The root cause identified was inadequate packaging practices for liquid items, compounded by a lack of labeling on the cup. The agent offered a refund and the option to resend the coffee, which the customer accepted.
